word: IN 1887 MR. CANRIGHT SEVERED HIS CONNECTION WITH THE SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTIST CHURCH FOREVER. HE SPENT HIS REMAINING YEARS IN WRITING AND SPEAKING AGAINST THE CHURCH AND MRS. WHITE. THE EARNEST APPEAL THAT IS MADE TO HIM AT THE CLOSE OF THIS SECTION MIGHT WELL CALL FOR SELF-EXAMINATION BY EACH READER.--WHITE TRUSTEES.
